column2: ggplot(top_up_lncRNA, aes(x = reorder(GeneSymbol, log2FC), y = log2FC, fill = negLog10P)) + geom_col() + scale_fill_gradient(low = "pink", high = "darkred", name = "-log10(p-value)") + coord_flip() + theme_minimal() + labs( title = "Top 20 Upregulated lncRNA", x = "Gene Symbol", y = "log2(Fold Change)")
